summary: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?
cast: Robert Young|Robert Mitchum|Robert Ryan|Gloria Grahame|Paul Kelly|Sam Levene|Jacqueline White|Steve Brodie|George Cooper|Richard Benedict|Tom Keene|William Phipps|Lex Barker|Marlo Dwyer|George Barrows|Eddie Borden|Robert Bray|Don Cadell|Carl Faulkner|Harry Harvey|Kenner G. Kemp|Kenneth MacDonald|George Meader|Philip Morris|Bill Nind|Jay Norris|William J. O'Brien|Allan Ray|George Turner
title: Encrucijada de odios
